name: Nova Cerul
description:
As you explore the city of Nova Cerul, you come across the Aetheron community that seeks aid in preparation of the Annual Research Festival held at the heart of the city. You join in the delivery team to help seek crystals to aid researchers. Through telepathic communication, you will be given clues through visuals to communicate with the characters in solving the challenge of communication and requests of the researchers. Completing these tasks will open you up history and unknown knowledge of the world.

2.5D Top-down exploration game.

Gameplay is as simple as movement (W,A,S,D) and interaction (E)
